narrative.narrative: StarFlyer is a Japanese airline based at Kitakyushu Airport. They were founded in 2002 but did not begin flying until 2006 upon the open of the new Kitakyushu Airport. They currenty fly 5 routes all in Japan and have 10 A320's. However they used to fly to Busan,South Korea but suspended service to their starting March 30th,2014. They took a big hit after the 2011 earthquake that resulted in massive cancellations, which included 7 of thier 29 pilots who were foreigners refusing to return to Japan following the disaster. It has codeshares with ANA and is owned at least 18% by them also. They currently have 601 employees.
